# DevOps Journal

DevOps Journal is a technical blog focused on DevOps practices, GitHub, Azure, and Microsoft technologies. The blog is hosted at https://devopsjournal.io and covers topics related to DevOps implementation, CI/CD pipelines, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, and software development best practices.

## About the Author

**Name:** Rob Bos  
**Pronouns:** He/Him  
**Location:** The Netherlands  
**Role:** DevOps Consultant & GitHub Trainer at Xebia  

## Professional Background

Rob Bos is a DevOps consultant and GitHub trainer working for Xebia Microsoft Services. He specializes in helping organizations implement DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and modern software development workflows with a focus on GitHub and Azure technologies.

### Certifications & Recognition
- Microsoft MVP since 2020
- GitHub Star since 2024
- GitHub Accredited Trainer (GitHub Developer, Copilot, Advanced Security, GitHub Actions)
- Microsoft Certified Trainer (AZ-900, AZ-204, AZ-400, AI-900, AI-102)
- LinkedIn Learning Instructor

### Training & Education
Rob provides training and education through multiple channels:
- GitHub official training courses
- LinkedIn Learning courses on GitHub Advanced Security and configuration
- Microsoft Azure and AI certifications training
- GitHub Partner Bootcamps

## Blog Content Focus

The DevOps Journal covers:
- DevOps practices and principles
- GitHub and GitHub Actions
- Azure and Azure DevOps
- CI/CD pipeline implementation
- Security practices and GitHub Advanced Security
- Software development workflows
- DevOps tooling and automation
- Supply chain security

## Technical Expertise

- **Primary Technologies:** C#, GitHub, Azure, Azure DevOps
- **Specializations:** DevOps implementation, CI/CD pipelines, GitHub Actions, security practices
- **Focus Areas:** Modern agile practices, DevOps coaching, supply chain security
